entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Snow near the Alberta border early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
